parameters.name: options.regexp
parameters.description: If the value key is a pattern, merge into all matching target keys. The value will be templated with capture groups for each matched key.

parameters.name: options.delete
parameters.description: Delete keys when merging in null value.

parameters.name: optinos.foldcase
parameters.description: Merges keys with case-insensitive match. New keys are added as is.
